title: Strata Clean Energy Celebrates 15 Years of Innovation and Growth in Renewable Energy - Business Wire
summary: Strata Clean Energy, founded in 2008 as a residential rooftop solar company, has grown into a leading provider of utility-scale clean energy solutions, with a focus on solar energy and energy storage. The company is celebrating its 15th anniversary with a strong track record of successful projects, including over 270 in operation, 3,000 MW of solar capacity, and 31,000 MWh of storage in its development pipeline.

business_innovation: TRUE, Strata's development of new products and services, such as hourly-matched renewable energy supply contracts and green hydrogen solutions, which are focused on advancing sustainability and striving for net zero emissions, can be considered business innovations.
green_product: TRUE, Strata's development and construction of solar energy and energy storage projects can be considered green products as they are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, Strata's commitment to sustainability and innovation in its development, engineering, procurement, construction, and operations & maintenance services for the utility market can be considered green processes as they aim to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
product_or_process: solar energy and energy storage projects, hourly-matched renewable energy supply contracts, green hydrogen solutions

title: Qcells North America Completes Dalton Factory Expansion - PR Newswire
summary: Qcells has completed a 2 GW expansion of its Dalton, Georgia, solar factory, bringing the total capacity to 5.1 GW, making it the largest solar panel plant in the Western Hemisphere. The expansion is part of a $2.5 billion investment by Qcells and will create 510 new jobs. Qcells will also build a new solar supply chain factory in Cartersville, Georgia, which will manufacture solar ingots, wafers, cells, and finished panels.
green_innovation: TRUE. The expansion of the Qcells Dalton factory is a green innovation because it will increase the production of solar panels, which are a renewable energy source that helps to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
business_innovation: TRUE. The expansion of the Qcells Dalton factory is a business innovation because it will increase the company's production capacity and create new jobs.
green_product: TRUE. The solar panels that Qcells manufactures are green products because they are made with environmentally friendly materials and processes and help to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

title: CICE Funds Innovation to Advance the Measuring, Monitoring, and Verification (MMV) of Carbon Management - Canada NewsWire
summary: The B.C. Centre for Innovation and Clean Energy (CICE) has announced $2.82 million in funding for four B.C.-based clean energy innovators: Arca, Metaspectral, Miraterra, and Quatern Limited Partnership. These companies are developing technologies to measure, monitor, and verify (MMV) carbon emission reductions, removals, and avoidance.

title: Arnab Das: Leading Strategic & Purposeful Growth | CEOInsightsAsia Vendor - CEO Insights Asia
summary: Arnab Das, Director of Global Gases Group, leads the company's expansion into healthcare and clean energy in emerging markets. Global Gases Group is a leading independent company specializing in industrial gases, particularly helium and gas mixtures. The company has made significant investments in healthcare and clean green energy in developing markets to provide affordable and accessible medical oxygen and clean cooking gas.

title: Dover Fueling Solutions Launches DX Promote Auto, a New Industry-Leading Managed Media Service - PR Newswire
summary: Dover Fueling Solutions (DFS) has launched DX Promote® Auto, a managed media service that provides fueling and convenience retailers access to a dedicated team that creates and manages custom advertising, including short-form infotainment, national promotions and major oil content. DFS will provide a customer intake form for banner ads on a quarterly basis. This will allow retailers to select monthly content picks to ensure relevance and value.

title: Lindsay Precast Announces the Launch of Lindsay Renewables - PR Newswire
summary: Lindsay Precast, a leading designer and prefabricator of engineered steel and precast concrete structures, has launched a new division called Lindsay Renewables. This division will focus on providing clean energy solutions, building on the company's decades of experience in the renewable space. Lindsay Renewables will offer a range of products and services, including Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) container integration, prefabricated skid mounted solutions, charging platforms for electric vehicles, solar ballasts for landfill applications, and substation equipment foundations.

green_product: TRUE, Lindsay Renewables products are designed to reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycle, such as the use of environmentally benign materials, sustainable production processes that minimize energy consumption and waste, and product functionalities that support recycling and low environmental impact during usage and disposal.
green_process: TRUE, Lindsay Renewables processes aim to reduce waste, conserve natural resources, decrease energy consumption, and limit the release of harmful substances into the environment, such as using renewable resources, recycling materials, employing energy-efficient technologies, and ensuring that products are biodegradable or easily recyclable at the end of their life cycle.
product_or_process: Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) container integration, prefabricated skid mounted solutions, charging platforms for electric vehicles, solar ballasts for landfill applications, and substation equipment foundations

title: TWG Launches New Electric Winch - PR Newswire
summary: TWG, part of Dover, has launched the dp EL22 Electric Winch with a 22,000 lb rated line-pull. The EL22 is an industrial-grade, high-performance DC electric winch that delivers up to 3x longer duty cycle than the competition. The EL22's entire electrical package is weather-resistant to deliver long-lasting reliability in the harshest conditions.
